entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Proposal: use ValueTask<TItem> in CacheExtensions.GetOrCreateAsync #67069
  • Disabled roslyn-analyzers subscription #67068
  • Make helpers for run-time OpenSSL version checks for the portable shim #67064
    Future
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeInformation package lacks type forwarding facade #67063
  • .NET 7 osx-arm64 single-file crashing with sigsegv #67062
  • Estimated signature size calculation for ECDsa and RSA may be incorrect #67059
  • Infra issue (deadletter) in CI `runtime-staging (Build Browser wasm release Browser_wasm_Windows)` in 6.0 #67058
  • Determine if there are further sets to special-case in RegexCompiler / source generator #67056
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Convert.FromBase64String to support ReadOnlySpan<char> input #67055
  • [API Proposal]: Add `AssemblyBuilder.ManifestModuleBuilder` and obsolete `AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule`. #67053
  • StreamPipeReader should override CompleteAsync #67050
    Future
  • Backport Move to Windows.10.Amd64.Server2022.ES.Open to 6.0 #67048
  • [Mono]: Interop/MonoAPI/MonoMono PInvokeDetach+Thunks+InstallEHCallback fails on Mono Windows. #67047
  • Assert failure: !CREATE_CHECK_STRING(pMT && pMT->Validate()) #67046
    7.0.0
  • Remove JIT-workaround for eliminating bound check #67044
  • SystemIcons outdated? #67040
  • Vector.ConditionalSelect and Vector128.ConditionalSelect don't emit vpblendvb on x64 #67039
    7.0.0
  • new Vector<T> for byte, short emits vpbroadcastd thus needs an imul #67038
  • Android test failed with DEVICE_NOT_FOUND #67032
  • Segmentation fault in LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests #67031
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Indexing with expression does not work #67029
  • Test failure JIT\\SIMD\\DivSignedUnsignedTest_r\\DivSignedUnsignedTest_r.cmd #67019

Closed

  • Test failure baseservices\\TieredCompilation\\BasicTestWithMcj\\BasicTestWithMcj.cmd #66917
    7.0.0
  • The Parallel.ForEachAsync propagates OperationCanceledException of unknown origin #66695
    7.0.0
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration.Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGeneration #66927
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'IsBaselineSimdIsaSupportedDebugOnly()' #66205
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\VS-ia64-JIT\\V2.0-Beta2\\b311420\\b311420\\b311420.cmd #66969
  • Why System.DirectoryServices.Protocols not working on linux? #64900
  • Confusing environment variable configuration prefix behaviour reintroduced in 6.0.2 #65756
    7.0.0
  • JsonNode/JsonObject not differentiating between missing property and null-value #66948
  • microsoft.xmlserializer.generator.6.0.0.nupkg fails to upload to nuget.server #66584
    7.0.0
  • Comment and implementation mismatch in impTypeIsAssignable #67026
    Future
  • NativeAOT: Crash with assertion during obj file emit. #63779
    Future
  • Implementing async/await using source generators #65540
  • [HTTP/3] Add ClientCertificates API #56362
    7.0.0
  • [regions] use the used range in the regions allocator for the heap range #50983
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix loop cloning for OSR #67067
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add arm64 cross-arch msi installers #67066
    area-Setup
  • Update coding-style to include target-typed new() guideline #67061
    area-Meta
  • Update the latest node for markdownlint #67060
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Android] Re-enable System.Security.Cryptography tests #67057
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Move to Windows.10.Amd64.Server2022.ES.Open #67054
    area-Infrastructure
  • Expose the custom type marshalling types for source-generated interop. #67052
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][emsdk] Update these packages manually #67051
    arch-wasm
  • Optimized string.Replace(char, char) #67049
    community-contribution
  • Fix ReferenceHandler test failures when enabling small buffer async in tests #67041
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Do not call into MsQuic inside a lock #67037
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add QuicConnection.IsSupported #67036
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Ensure Sync stream serialization is handling IAsyncEnumerable correctly #67035
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Add dynamic shim for SSL_CTX_set_options and SSL_set_options #67030
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Enable string properties evaluation: Length + Char[]. #67028
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add a --aot-lazy-assembly-load command line option to load assemblies… #67024
    tenet-performance, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Disable multi-level lookup by default #67022
    area-Host, 7.0.0
  • Add ReplenishingRateLimiter and IdleDuration #67020
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0

Merged

  • System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource: Perf improvement for System.Diagnostics.Enumerator<T> #67012
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Improves handling of env prefixes containing __ #65757
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-Configuration, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventSource` #66802
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Fix nullable annotations in `EventSourceLogger` #67065
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Eat cancellation exceptions from WaitAsync in Parallel.ForEachAsync #66712
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Optimize generic sharing for generic methods. #64129
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove unnecessary XmlQualifiedName allocations from XsdBuilder.ProcessElement/Attribute #67045
    area-System.Xml, tenet-performance
  • Avoid bool[] allocation in MemberInfoCache.PopulateProperties #66912
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance
  • Improve nullable annotations for `ILogger.BeginScope` #66960
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Remove libunwind disabled warnings. #67042
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Ensure that fgMorphFieldToSimdGetElement doesn't call gtNewSimdGetElementNode if the ISA is unsupported #66853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Give end-marker symbols their own addresses to work around a linker bug #66999
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add Fedora 37 RID #67021
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Add the CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute type to make it easier to identify marshaller types #65591
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Change CoreCLR diagnostic resource production to remove cross-component build dependency #67018
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Workaround NuGet error in Content_Types #66744
    area-Serialization
  • Delete System.Runtime.Experimental leftovers #66819
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove delegate/closure allocations from DynamicAssemblies.IsTypeDynamic #66797
    area-System.Xml, tenet-performance
  • [mono][interp] Enable some tests #66947
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Support using the system version of brotli #66462
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Reject mismatched symbol files #67027
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [arm64] JIT: Better addressing modes around bytes #66902
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete create-codespaces-prebuild.yml #67015
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add metrics for caching #66479
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • Add vectorized paths for Span<T>.Reverse #64412
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Remove char[] allocations from RegistryKey #66918
    area-Microsoft.Win32, tenet-performance
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Memory containment for `FIELD_LIST` operands on x86 #65803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.TraceSource` #66892
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Debug` #66862
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [No review] NativeAOT CoreCLR testing #65491
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][aot] Run the high resource AOT tests on build machine itself #67017
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Replace bool[] arrays with Span<bool> in XML deserialization #66914
    area-Serialization, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Use the stapled OCSP response from TLS, when available. #67011
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Leaf level AOT annotation for CoreLib library #66976
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve vectorization of String.Split #64899
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Cleaned up code #66981
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add timestamp-based expiration to cached SafeFreeCredentials #66334
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add reciprocal and SinCos methods to IFloatingPoint #59521
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize DateTimeOffset #58169
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Ensure that InstructionSetFlags are correctly fixed up for unmatched VM #64158
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Multiple enveloped signatures #67010
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Don't apply IMAGE_REL_BASED_REL32 when address doesn't belong to current section #66855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Methods on primitives 65707 #66654
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Debuger tests refactor 63667 #63730
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve `CreateDirectory` on Windows #66754
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • FileSystem: MoveDirectory: some improvements. #65132
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Use ROS<byte> instead of byte[] where it makes sense on S.S.C.Cose #66741
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add additional trace to HttpConnectionPool #66958
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Improve `QuicImplementationProviders.MsQuic.IsSupported` for TLS1.3 On Windows #66019
    area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • Double Vector128 for SpanHelpers.IndexOf(byte,byte,int) on ARM64 #66993
    area-System.Memory
  • Fixes #66141: ConfigurationBinder and ISet #66151
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Delete AssemblyBuilderData and ModuleBuilderData #66996
    area-System.Reflection
  • Managed implementation of NTLM for Android and tvOS #66879
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Add Fedora 37 RID #65392
    NO-MERGE, area-Host, community-contribution
  • CoreCLR runtime tests on Mono Windows x64. #64281
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Infra for regeneration of third-party-notices file #60091
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Use shared SocketAddress code in QUIC #66794
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [wasm] Dead code removal, minor fixes #66418
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Cache several char[] allocations in System.Private.Xml library methods #67001
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Use stackalloc in System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.NumberFormatterBase.ConvertToAlphabetic #67003
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [debugger][wasm] ValueTypeClass refactoring. #63626
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Replace 2 allocations from string.ToCharArray() with ReadOnlySpan in System.Private.Xml library #67002
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Fix hanging of NamedPipeClientStream when connecting with infinite timeout #66877
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Remove one string allocation in XmlTextEncoder by using stackalloc span and TryFormat #67005
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Avoid name collision for covariant and hidden properties (#63443) #63823
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [Draft]Use ValueStringBuilder in Encode/DecodeName #65893
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Added tests for changing a list size being iterated on (#65608) #65615
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Sort properties by protection level in structures. #63339
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Transition the x86 backend to use SSE for fp arithmetic. #65723
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Refactor suggested in 65842 #66821
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add support for creating delegates to static virtual methods #66936
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Reenable crossgen2 promotion outside version bubble #66983
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Perform reachability analysis before codegen #66967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixes #42643 allow keys with colons in JSON config #66886
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Avoid issuing connection attempts for already cancelled requests #66992
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging perf/wasm/aot #66973
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • Remove the Unix code from `System.Drawing.Common`. #64623
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Initial version with the following features: #61926
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add almalinux support #62184
    area-Host
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.7 #67006
    area-Build-mono
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 and arm64 #65675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update breaking-change-rules.md #66978
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Fix cancel in PipeReader.ReadAtLeastAsync #66870
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Pipelines, 6.0.x
